channel.title: https on 于九博客
channel.description: Recent content in https on 于九博客

item.title: nodejs发送https请求
item.description:
var https = require('https');

https.request({
  hostname: 'nodejs.org',
  port: 443,
  path: '/api/https.html',
  method: 'GET'
}, function(res) {
  console.log("statusCode: ", res.statusCode);
  console.log("headers: ", res.headers);

  res.on('data', function(d) {
    process.stdout.write(d);
  });
}).on('error', function(e) {
  console.error(e);
}).end();
